document.full_text: cisco systems inc  will streamline its sales, services, and engineering organizations and refocus around five growth markets, in a significant restructuring at a company which had admitted it lost its way.
document.title: cisco plans streamline to five units
lines_and_colors: cisco systems inc  will streamline its sales, services, and engineering organizations and refocus around five growth markets, in a significant restructuring at a company which had admitted it lost its way.
